name: The Figures
description:
pick up the eight books and go to the library.

Move - Arrows

Jump - X

Collect Itens - C

Spikes = Death

Cars = Death

Ghosts = Death

Pick the Eight Books and move to Library Door and press C = Win the Game

Death = Restar all from title screen

A Game by Mikeinel and me.

Programmer: RoyalGuards

Pixel Artist: Mikeinel
